mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT ( product_no, product_name, brand_id, tech_id, thickness_id, identify_id, price, amount, create_user_id ) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{brandId}, #{techId}, #{thicknessId}, #{identifyId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT product.id,product.brand_id,brand.name brand_name ,product.product_no,product.product_name,tech.id tech_id,tech.name tech_name, product.amount,thickness.id thickness_id,thickness.name thickness_name, product.price,product.create_time,user.id user_id,user.username user_name, identify.id identify_id,identify.name identify_name FROM t_product product LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_user user on user.id = product.create_user_id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify on identify.id = product.identify_id

SELECT count(*) FROM t_product product LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id
mapper.update: update t_product set amount = amount + #{amount},price = #{price} where id = #{id}
